top_comments_top.body: Time to take a gander at the other 99.9% of games available.

>Plays exclusively one genre  
>  
>Complains about games being all the same

I think one half of my brain just offed itself. 

Regardless, I don't care about any of the games you brought up and think they're all boring. I'm pretty happy with the current gaming industry.

Aren't there tons and tons of games to your liking already?

I mean, the pew-pew games are plentyful as well but that's not the point.
You're confused about the difference between marketing and the market. Tons of these games on the market, not many with huge marketing campaigns
